title: Pussycat Doll Kimberly Wyatt welcomes third child with Max Rogers
text:
Kimberly Wyatt welcomed her third child with husband Max on Saturday (Picture: Kimberly Wyatt/Instagram/Rex)

Pussycat Doll Kimberley Wyatt is now the proud mother of three children after welcoming her newest addition to the world on Saturday.

The dancer and her model husband Max Rogers are already parents to four-year-old Willow and one-year-old Maple.

And they were delighted to share the news of their newborn’s safe arrival into the world via Max’s Twitter account.

‘Happy to announce that @KimberlyKWyatt gave birth this afternoon,’ he wrote. ‘Mum & baby are doing very well. Looking forward to sharing all the details in a few weeks,for now we will switch off and welcome the new arrival to our family.

‘My wife is incredible. @NHSEnglandLDN is a privelage (sic).’

Fans were already anticipating the birth after Kimberley revealed she was in hospital and ready to bring her child into the world.

Kimberly had been hoping to give birth naturally (Picture: Kimberly Wyatt/Instagram

‘Saying goodbye to my baby bump! …See you on the other side,’ she wrote alongside a snap of herself in her underwear.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Kimberly is also hoping that she can give birth to baby number three naturally, after having two C-sections with her daughters.

Happy to announce that @KimberlyKWyatt gave birth this afternoon. Mum & baby are doing very well. Looking forward to sharing all the details in a few weeks,for now we will switch off and welcome the new arrival to our family. My wife is incredible. @NHSEnglandLDN is a privelage. — Max Rogers (@max_rogers) October 11, 2019

She said: ‘My wish has always been to have a natural birth, but I’ve not been that lucky. I’ve had two caesareans and I’m coming to terms with probably having another one.’

The dancer, who is already mum to four-year-old Willow and Maple, one, told OK! magazine: ‘We weren’t planning on having a third child this quickly. I can’t deny I’d like to have a boy but ultimately we just want a happy and healthy baby.’

English model Max added that they already have names for a boy picked out, but if they’re blessed with another girl, she will have a tree-themed name just like her sisters.

The American star married Max in September 2013 after two and a half years of dating, and has now settled in the UK.

description: Pussycat Doll Kimberly Wyatt gives birth to her third child with husband Max Rogers as couple confirm the news on social media.
